trans-unit.source: Provides an interface that can extend a designer loader to support asynchronous loading of external components.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个接口，该接口可以扩展设计器加载程序以支持外部组件的异步加载。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader> can implement this interface to manage designer loading that involves external components.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>可以实现此接口可管理涉及外部组件的设计器加载。

trans-unit.source: This interface also allows external components to initiate a reload of the design surface by calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.Reload%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此接口还允许外部组件调用启动的设计图面重新加载<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.Reload%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A designer loader does not have to implement this interface if it does not require support for asynchronous loading.
trans-unit.target: 设计器加载程序不需要实现此接口，如果不需要异步加载支持。

trans-unit.source: Designer loading using a custom implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> can occur in a variety of ways.
trans-unit.target: 设计器加载使用的自定义实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>可以出现各种不同的方式。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes external components are involved in the loading process.
trans-unit.target: 在加载过程中涉及有时外部组件。

trans-unit.source: To facilitate loading with external dependencies, the designer loader service interface provides a mechanism that determines when loading is complete and allows each portion of loading to signal that it has completed.
trans-unit.target: 为了便于加载具有外部依赖项，设计器加载程序服务接口提供了一种机制，确定何时加载已完成，并允许负载，以指示它已完成的每个部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> typically determines when loading is complete by testing a counter that tracks the number of load dependencies remaining.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>通常用于确定加载时通过测试的计数器，用于跟踪剩余的负载依赖关系的数量已完成。

trans-unit.source: When each portion of the load completes, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> is called, and the service decrements the counter.
trans-unit.target: 完成的负载每个部分后，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A>调用时，同时服务递减计数器。

trans-unit.source: To set the number of dependent load processes, call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> once for each load process that calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> when its loading is complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置依赖加载进程的数量，请调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A>一次针对调用每个负载进程<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A>其加载过程何时完成。

trans-unit.source: When the final loading is complete, the service calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost.EndLoad%2A> on the loader host.
trans-unit.target: 最终加载完成时，服务调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost.EndLoad%2A>加载程序主机上。

trans-unit.source: Registers an external component as part of the load process managed by this interface.
trans-unit.target: 将外部组件注册为由此接口管理的加载进程的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> once for each external object participating in the load process.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A>一次针对每个参与加载过程的外部对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> is called when the work of the load process is done.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> 加载过程的工作都完成时调用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the load of the designer is successful; <see langword="false" /> if errors prevented the load from finishing.
trans-unit.target: 如果设计器的加载成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果出现的错误阻止了加载完成，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection of errors that occurred during the load, if any.
trans-unit.target: 加载期间发生的错误（如果有的话）的集合。

trans-unit.source: If no errors occurred, pass either an empty collection or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有发生任何错误，则传递空集合或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Signals that a dependent load has finished.
trans-unit.target: 发出信号表示已完成依赖加载。

trans-unit.source: This method is called to signal that a dependent loading operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以发出信号依赖加载操作已完成。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> once for every process that was registered by calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A>, which has already completed.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A>一次为每个进程都已由调用注册<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A>，已完成的。

trans-unit.source: If the dependent load succeeds, the caller sets the `successful` parameter to `true` and passes either an empty collection or `null` to the `errorCollection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果依赖加载成功，调用方集`successful`参数`true`并传递空集合或`null`到`errorCollection`参数。

trans-unit.source: If the dependent load encounters errors, the caller sets the `successful` parameter to `false` and passes a collection of exceptions that indicate the reason or reasons for failure to the `errorCollection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果依赖加载遇到错误，调用方将设置`successful`参数`false`并将传递的指示或多个与失败的原因的异常集合`errorCollection`参数。

trans-unit.source: Reloads the design document.
trans-unit.target: 重新加载设计文档。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the reload request is accepted, or <see langword="false" /> if the loader does not allow the reload.
trans-unit.target: 如果接受重新加载请求，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果加载程序不允许重新加载，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Any object can call this method to request that the loader reload the design document.
trans-unit.target: 任何对象都可以调用此方法来请求，加载程序重新加载设计文档。

trans-unit.source: If the loader supports reloading and complies with the reload, the designer loader can return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果加载程序支持重新加载并执行重新加载，则设计器加载程序可以返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns `false`, indicating that the reload will not occur.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将返回`false`，指示将不会发生重新加载。

trans-unit.source: Callers cannot rely on the reload happening immediately; the designer loader can schedule this for some other time, or it can try to reload at once.
trans-unit.target: 调用方不能依赖立即; 发生重新加载设计器加载程序可以计划这段时间，或它可以尝试重新加载一次。

trans-unit.source: The caller can display a message to the user if the designer cannot be reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法重新加载设计器，调用方可以向用户显示一条消息。
